item.title: Teaching Schedule
item.description: SANS Chicago Spring 2020 Dates: June 01 - June 06, 2020 Course: Windows Forensic Analysis Type: Conference SANS Virginia Beach 2020 Dates: August 24 - August 29, 2020 Course: Windows Forensic Analysis Type: Conference

item.title: About
item.description: Lodrina teaches the FOR500 Windows Forensic Analysis class as an Instructor for SANS. Lodrina is also a product manager at Cybereason, and a frequent contributor to This Week in 4n6.
